meanings.definition: A member of the Spanish nobility
meanings.sent1: The hidalgo rode proudly on his horse through the town.
meanings.sent2: The hidalgos gathered at the castle for a grand feast.
meanings.sent3: The hidalgo tried to juggle oranges at the market, much to the amusement of the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: His kindness and generosity made him a true hidalgo among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The hidalgo's elegant attire and confident demeanor set him apart from the common folk.

meanings.definition: A nobleman or gentleman of high social status
meanings.sent1: The wealthy hidalgo owned vast lands and a magnificent mansion.
meanings.sent2: The hidalgos of the city were known for their impeccable manners.
meanings.sent3: The hidalgo tried to dance the tango but ended up stepping on his own feet, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, he was considered a hidalgo for his fair dealings and honorable conduct.
meanings.sent5: His deep voice and commanding presence marked him as a true hidalgo among the crowd.
